name: Crime & Punishment: THE GAME
description:
Created for TOjam12.

Help Raskolnikov go down his journey of megalomaniacal insanity as he murders a pawnbroker! In this section, the player must keep Semyon awake as he tells Raskolnikov about how he ruined his family's life. Make sure Semyon does not fall asleep, or Raskolnikov will change his mind about the murder. You must feed him enough alcohol before the timer runs out, and he falls asleep.

Team:

Design: Meagan Byrne (@byrne_meagan)

Music and Concept: Brian Gilmour (@BogartGilmour)
